scenes.text: It's that you're fighting your own programming.

The brain fights back with a determined expression. Both look exhausted from the internal battle. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Your brain is designed to keep you comfortable, not successful.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, sitting in a luxurious armchair wrapped in a cozy blanket, sipping hot cocoa with a satisfied smile. A trophy labeled 'SUCCESS' sits far away, ignored. The brain looks content staying comfortable. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, holding a megaphone and shouting loudly. Sound waves and noise symbols blast outward in all directions. The volume is overwhelming and intense. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Your mom tells you to get a real job.

scenes.text: That discomfort is your brain panicking because it's not being fed dopamine.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, sweating profusely and looking panicked and desperate. Empty feeding bowls labeled 'DOPAMINE' surround it. The brain reaches out desperately for stimulation. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Here's why: Your brain has limited willpower.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, standing next to a battery meter showing limited charge at about 30%. The brain looks tired with finite energy. The meter shows 'WILLPOWER' as the label. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Your brain can't act on vague.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, looking confused at a blurry undefined cloud of text. Question marks surround it. The brain throws up its hands unable to process the vagueness. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, wearing engineer goggles, working backward from $100,000 with arrows and calculations flowing from the goal back to actionable steps. The brain looks confident and capable. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Your brain will manufacture a thousand excuses.
scenes.prompt: A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, operating a factory assembly line, producing excuse papers that pile up endlessly. The factory works overtime creating reasons not to act. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
